p: The Latin-American revolutionary Ernesto ‘Che’ Guevara, physician by training, stated that ‘ the life of a single human being is worth a million time more than all the property of the richest man on earth’ and he continued: ‘ medicine will have to convert itself into a science that serves to prevent disease and orients the public toward carrying out its medical duties. Medicine should only intervene in cases of extreme urgency, to perform surgery or something else which lies outside the skills of the people’ ( 2).
